amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to address the disproportionate regulatory burdens on community banks and credit unions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 490 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 490 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Ayotte. (consideration: CR S1885-1886; text: CR S1885) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to address the disproportionate regulatory burdens on community banks and credit unions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 490 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 490 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Ayotte.
